title: Manage Access for a Scheduled Event at a Rec Center
description: A community group has booked a room at a recreation center. An operator must ensure the doors are unlocked for them at the scheduled time.

tasks.description: Review the day's event schedule for the 'Community Rec Center'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a booking for 'Room 3B' from 6 PM to 8 PM.

tasks.description: Create a temporary rule in the access control system to automatically unlock the doors to 'Room 3B' at 5:55 PM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the door to unlock.

tasks.description: Create a second rule to automatically lock the doors again at 8:05 PM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the door to re-lock after the event.
